title: OHHHH MMMYYY GAAWWWDDDDD
message:
OHHHH MMMYYY GAAWWWDDDDD

After two weeks I think I finally fixed the bug of the widget not updating
After some time randomly. The secret is that the class updating the widget MUST
be a broadcast receiver, and having a service that will stay alive, opposed to some random
class to keep calling the broadcast receiver works the best :)

title: Successfully stopped the app from updating after screen lock
message:
Successfully stopped the app from updating after screen lock

The device no longer updates after screen lock, and only the broadcast
reciever wating for your phone to unlock will run. This will save a significant
Amount of battery on a user's phone! :)

title: Cleaned up some code, Made the Providers use OOP, And fixed Slow updating
message:
Cleaned up some code, Made the Providers use OOP, And fixed Slow updating

Cleaned up some comments of code, as well as made the multiple size providers
use a helper class to centralize our alarm calls, and lastly, fixed the
slow updating of the app on newer devices, as a new android requirement
forced the app to update every 5 seconds instead of every second
